amendment.description: Amendment applies the on-budget surplus to the pay-go scorecard to allow the surplus to be used for either offsetting tax relief or entitlement reform.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 106-613 to add a new subtitle providing for spending accountability lock-box. Under the amendment, amounts not spent are directed toward reducing the debt instead of being routed to other spending accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (WI) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
